name: Rainbows End
description:
Walk on Rainbow's, collect magic beans, fight evil Blueberry's and meet a Unicorn. What a lovely day were having...

Short and sweet game, cutest game ever!!!

up, down, left & right to move

x to make rainbows

space to jump

Fun facts

This is my second Game Jam

I loved making this game

Wish I had more time for than one level (I may have to add more)
